titleStmt.title: An exposition of the festiuall epistles and gospels vsed in our English liturgie together with a reason why the church did chuse the same / by Iohn Boys ... ; the first part from the feast of S. Andreuu the Apostle, to the purification of Blessed Mary the Virgin.
titleStmt.author: Boys, John, 1571-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Eduuard Griffin for William Aspley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
